name: RaceWay (itch)
description:
Made as 1st semester project for the Game Design course at PUC Minas. 

It's a arcade racing game which simulates RC car racing throug a track assembled by a kid in the middle of his own room.

Until now the only game mode it's a time attack where you must race and find how fast you can finish the track.

Share in the comments your best lap time!
